NEXTAUTH_URL.description: The URL of your Vercel deployment (e.g., https://your-app.vercel.app)

NEXTAUTH_SECRET.description: Secret key for NextAuth (min 32 characters). Must match backend NEXTAUTH_SECRET.

AUTH_SECRET.description: Same as NEXTAUTH_SECRET for NextAuth v5

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL.description: Backend API URL from Railway (e.g., https://your-backend.railway.app/api)

headers.value: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version, Authorization
